verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: separated] [ARG1: 1,995 children] [ARG2: from 1,940 adults] [ARGM-TMP: between April 19 and May 31] , a spokesman for Department of Homeland Security said Friday .
[ARG1: The Trump administration separated 1,995 children from 1,940 adults between April 19 and May 31] , [ARG0: a spokesman for Department of Homeland Security] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] .
